1456660.name: Ball at Work: Boss Edition!
1456660.description:
It's time that everyone at the office respects your authority! Leapfrog to the top of the food chain at this crazy office with the special privileges of the Ball at Work: Boss Edition!


"Unlimited and unrestricted access to all the levels in the game!"

The Boss Edition DLC gives you unlimited and unrestricted access to all the levels in the game and many more levels will be continuously added with some unbelievable new tricks and traps! Every single level in the Boss Edition is unique with different challenges that test your precision, reflexes and problem-solving and we have ensured that the difficulty increases by just the right amount as you progress so you are constantly able to improve your skills and work towards improving your standing on the leaderboards!


"Compete in the LiveWire Series with users from around the globe!"

Gain exclusive access to the LiveWire feature and participate in new monthly events where you can compete with users from across the globe! We will be pushing the content straight into the game so you will never have to update the app and the top-three users at the end of each LiveWire event will be featured inside the game for the next LiveWire event! Needless to say, the LiveWire levels will be super fun and super challenging!


"Exclusive themes for special events on Halloween, New Year and more!"

The DLC also gives users exclusive access to premium and limited-time graphics and themes that we will be introducing into the game for special events such as Halloween, New Year and more..

From spooky cobwebs and cyclops balls on Halloween to an ice cold theme during the winter season, these beautifully detailed and exclusive graphics will be pushed straight to the app from our server and will be made available only in the Boss Edition!

BOSS EDITION FEATURES:


  • Unlimited and unrestricted access to all the levels in the game
  • Access the LiveWire series and compete in limited-time events with users from around the globe
  • Winners of each LiveWire event will be featured inside the game
  • Exclusive access to season specials and limited-time themes and modifications
1456660.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
